high_confluence_dates.significance: Three-asset convergence: Bitcoin turning point with 86% down stat, EUR/USD turning point, Oil turning point with 76% up stat next day
Gold cycle date + Oil 76% up stat + Bitcoin weekly cycle influence
S&P 500 and Gold both have turning points in the 10-12 June range
EUR/USD turning point + 75% up, Gold turning point, S&P weekly cycle window
EUR/USD turning point + 75% up, Gold turning point
Gold turning point + 73% up, Oil turning point + 75% up, near S&P 500 June 27 date
Four-asset convergence: S&P 90% up stat, Bitcoin turning point, EUR/USD turning point, Oil turning point. Strongest confluence date of the month.

themes: June 2025 is described as one of the most historically significant months in recent memory, sitting at the intersection of 82-year and 164-year revolution/war cycles
Geopolitical risk is elevated: Trump's birthday (June 14) falls within Fibonacci 61.8 years from JFK assassination, and historical presidential assassination/upheaval cycles cluster in June/July
Most assets show a pattern of potential strength in early June, weakness/correction mid-month, and recovery late June
Gold and S&P 500 face potential Wave 5 / double-top technical patterns suggesting major trend changes could be approaching
Oil remains in a structural downtrend while other assets are near highs - a clear divergence to monitor
The report heavily emphasizes that cycle dates are turning points (not directional signals) - the actual direction depends on price action, trend, and technical levels at those dates
Cross-asset trading across all five assets is recommended for higher overall success probability
The Discord community provides real-time updates and trades that complement the monthly report
risk_rules: Cycle dates indicate POTENTIAL turning points with +/- 1 day tolerance - they do NOT guarantee direction
Always combine cycle dates with technical analysis (support/resistance, chart patterns, indicators) before entering trades
Take partial profits gradually and trail stops to momentum-based levels on the daily chart, not distant weekly support
Options traders should consider using puts as hedges on certain positions given the elevated volatility window
Leverage through 2x-3x ETFs carries amplified risk during cycle convergence periods
Mental/emotional management is as important as the financial plan - avoid impulsive decisions and be selective in trade choices
When trading counter-trend, only enter after a clear technical reversal signal on intraday charts (4h, 30min)
When a 'double cycle' occurs (two dates close together), the first date often causes a reversal and the second reinstates the original direction
None of the report content constitutes investment advice - it is for educational purposes only. Seek professional financial advice
Stay connected to the Discord community for real-time updates during the month, as market conditions evolve

previous_month_summary.sp500: 5 cycle dates, 4 worked well. Very successful month from cycles perspective.

previous_month_summary.eurusd: 4 cycle dates, 3 captured high/low. Not classic but partially successful.
previous_month_summary.gold: 4 cycle dates, all worked with +/- 1 day tolerance. Perfect month.
